content: c m b beanie please note this pattern is designed by cuddle me beanies this pattern is not for resale and does not include sale rights by purchasing this pattern you agree to these terms cuddlemebeanies copyright redistribution of this pattern is prohibited you may sell the finished product but please mention me as the patterns author with a link to my facebook page and email www facebook com/cuddlemebeanies & cuddlemebeanies@gmail com http //www craftsy com/user/1158438/pattern-store craftsy store http //www ravelry com/designers/april-bennett-with-cuddle-me-beanies ravelry shop 1 c m b beanie sizes one size fits most skill level intermediate need to know basic to intermediate knitting stitches and follow knitting instructions gauge no gauge materials us 8 5 00mm 16 circular needle us 8 5 00mm dpns 7oz worsted weight yarn this amount will make 2 beanies scrap yarn for crocheted provisional co scissors yarn needle and pom pom i made this beanie using bernat super value yarn you can use any worsted weight yarn of your choice just check the gauge colors used in photo above main color oatmeal read the entire pattern and notes before starting your project 2 abbreviations yo = yarn over dpns = double pointed needles co = cast on pm = place marker k = knit sts = stitches st st = stockinette stitch round = round k2tog = knit 2 stitches together 1x1 ribbing = 1 knit stitch and 1 purl stitch 1x1 twisted ribbing = 1 knit stitch twisted and 1 purl stitch twisted pattern notes 1 - this beanie is very basic and easy the only part that is tricky is the ribbing if you are not comfortable with the 1x1 twisted ribbing method or the crocheted provisional co method you can use the cast on method you prefer and work 1x1 ribbing instead of twisted 2 - i think the crocheted provisional co method along with the 1x1 twisted ribbing looks the best and is worth the extra time 3 i have included 3 different variations of this beanie 1 - twisted 1x1 ribbing with crochet provisional co 2 regular 1x1 ribbing with crochet provisional co 3 - regular 1x1 ribbing 4 - the hat looks great with or without the pom pom i bought the faux fur pom poms from my local craft store but you could easily make a yarn pom pom as well 5 - measurement this beanie is very stretchy it should fit most young children and adults as well if you want the beanie to be larger or smaller follow the same instructions and change the needle size as desired 6 messy bun beanie to make this hat into a messy bun beanie follow the same instructions but stop after working round 54 then bind off using the stretchy bind off method of choice 3 instructions c m b beanie twisted 1x1 ribbing with crochet provisional co ribbing band co 88 sts using provisional co method join in the round and pm round 1 work 1x1 ribbing
